1.16.5.0.1.3:
-Added feature toggle configuration options to enable/disable underbiomes and entities.
-Added configuration option to enable/disable Undermod adaptation to previously generated chunks.
-Worlds now detect changes in Undermod configuration and update generation accordingly.
-Fixed bug that spawned floating blocks of water in underground rivers under certain conditions.
1.16.5.0.1.2:
-Improved compatibility with other world generation mods.
-Fixed indeterministic generation error.
-Increased equipped leech head size to work with all player skins.
1.16.5.0.1.1:
-Fixed crash when equipping leech head.
-Increased sewers frequency and probability of large tunnels.
-Added silk touch drops for stalactite blocks.
1.16.5.0.1.0:
First version of Undermod! Included underbiomes:
-Sewers
-Crater
-Underground Forest
-Underground Sea
-Undeground River
-Caverns
